[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m807[0m[34m of [0m[33m1401[0m[31m ]--[0m

[30;1m3967 | [0m[35msatisfy the"[0m

[30;1m751 | [0m[35m    def _get_param_script_portion(self, instance: Script) -> str:[0m
[30;1m752 | [0m[35m        """Constructs and returns a script that loads the parameters of the specified arguments.[0m
[30;1m753 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m754 | [0m[35m        Since Argo passes parameters through `{{input.parameters.name}}` it can be very cumbersome f[0m
[30;1m755 | [0m[35m        manage that. This creates a script that automatically imports json and loads/adds code to in[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m1101[0m[34m of [0m[33m1401[0m[31m ]--[0m
   Rule Id: [34mBD000610[0m
       Tag: [34mSecurity.Backdoor.LOLBAS.Linux[0m
  Severity: [36mModerate[0m, Confidence: [36mLow[0m
  Filename: [33m/hera-5.20.1/src/hera/workflows/script.py[0m
   Pattern: [32m\s(apt|apt\-get|aria2c|arp|ash|awk|base64|bash|bpftrace|busybox|cat|chmod|chown|cp|cpan|cpulimit|crontab|csh|curl|cut|dash|dd|diff|dmesg|dmsetup|dnf|docker|dpkg|easy_install|ed|emacs|env|expand|expect|facter|find|finger|flock|fmt|ftp|gawk|gdb|gimp|git|grep|head|iftop|ionice|ip|irb|jjs|journalctl|jrunscript|ksh|ld\.so|ldconfig|logsave|ltrace|lua|mail|mawk|mount|mtr|mv|mysql|nano|nawk|nc|nice|nl|nmap|node|od|openssl|perl|pg|php|pic|pico|pip|puppet|readelf|red|rlogin|rlwrap|rpm|rpmquery|rsync|ruby|run\-mailcap|run\-parts|rvim|scp|screen|script|sed|service|setarch|sftp|shuf|smbclient|socat|sort|sqlite3|ssh|start\-stop\-daemon|stdbuf|strace|systemctl|tail|tar|taskset|tclsh|tcpdump|tee|telnet|tftp|time|timeout|tmux|top|ul|unexpand|uniq|unshare|vi|vim|watch|wget|whois|wish|xargs|xxd|yum|zsh|zypper)\s[0m
[30;1m735 | [0m[35m    This script constructor is focused on taking a Python script/function "as is" for remote executi[0m
[30;1m736 | [0m[35m    constructor processes the script to infer what parameters it needs to deserialize so the script [0m
[30;1m737 | [0m[35m    The submitted script will contain prefixes such as new imports, e.g. `import os`, `import json`,[0m
[30;1m738 | [0m[35m    will contain the necessary `json.loads` calls to deserialize the parameters so they are usable b[0m

[30;1m34 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m35 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m37 | [0m[35m# using the script decorator[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m1175[0m[34m of [0m[33m1401[0m[31m ]--[0m
   Rule Id: [34mBD000700[0m

[30;1m85 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m86 | [0m[35m        template = self.build()[0m
[30;1m87 | [0m[35m        try:[0m
[30;1m88 | [0m[35m            curr = self.get()[0m
[30;1m89 | [0m[35m            template.metadata.resource_version = curr.metadata.resource_version[0m
[30;1m90 | [0m[35m        except NotFound:[0m
[30;1m91 | [0m[35m            return self.create()[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m1176[0m[34m of [0m[33m1401[0m[31m ]--[0m

[30;1m148 | [0m[35m    def _get_as_workflow(self, generate_name: Optional[str]) -> Workflow:[0m
[30;1m149 | [0m[35m        workflow = cast(Workflow, Workflow.from_dict(self.to_dict()))[0m
[30;1m150 | [0m[35m        workflow.kind = "Workflow"[0m
[30;1m151 | [0m[35m        workflow.workflows_service = self.workflows_service  # bind this workflow to the same servic[0m
[30;1m152 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m153 | [0m[35m        if generate_name is not None:[0m
[30;1m154 | [0m[35m            workflow.generate_name = generate_name[0m
[30;1m155 | [0m[35m        else:[0m

[30;1m61 | [0m[35m    @classmethod[0m
[30;1m62 | [0m[35m    def _check_values(cls, values):[0m
[30;1m63 | [0m[35m        """Validates that only one of `value` or `value_from_input` is specified."""[0m

[30;1m558 | [0m[35m    def _build_volume_mounts(self) -> Optional[List[VolumeMount]]:[0m
[30;1m559 | [0m[35m        """Processes the `volume_mounts` field and generates an optional list of `VolumeMount`s."""[0m
[30;1m560 | [0m[35m        # while it's possible for `volume_mounts` to be `None`, this has to check that `volumes` is [0m
[30;1m561 | [0m[35m        # it's possible that Hera can find volume mounts to generate for the user if there are any v[0m
[30;1m562 | [0m[35m        if self.volume_mounts is None and self.volumes is None:[0m
[30;1m563 | [0m[35m            return None[0m
[30;1m564 | [0m[35m[0m
